alert.note: Alert for Livingston Area; Melville Foothills; Northern Sweet Grass (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 22 at 1:29PM MST until February 23 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Billings
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow continues into tonight. Additional snow accumulations up to 2 inches, with locally higher amounts over favored east facing foothills. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph resulting in widespread blowing snow and wind chill values as low as -40 degrees. * WHERE...Livingston Area, Melville Foothills, and Northern Sweet Grass. * WHEN...Until 5 AM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Expect slick and snow covered roadways. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility at times. Dangerous wind chills can result in frostbite on exposed skin in a matter of minutes.
info.instruction: Travel outside of populated areas is strongly discouraged through Thursday morning. If you must travel, keep a survival kit with blankets, food and water in the vehicle. Let someone know where you are going and when you plan to arrive. For the latest road conditions, call 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Livingston Area; Melville Foothills; Northern Sweet Grass
